title: Fix scrolling functionality on mobile devices and verify overall mobile compatibility

requirements.text: Diagnose and fix scrolling issues on mobile devices by examining CSS overflow properties, touch-action directives, viewport height calculations, and scroll event handlers across all scrollable containers including main content areas, dialogs, and sidebar navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Users can scroll vertically through content on mobile devices using touch gestures
Scrolling works in all major content areas: movie catalog, dialogs, profile pages, and navigation menus
No CSS properties block touch-based scrolling (overflow: hidden, touch-action: none, or similar)
Scroll behavior is smooth and responsive without lag or stuck scroll positions
Both iOS Safari and Android Chrome support scrolling correctly

requirements.text: Perform comprehensive mobile compatibility verification testing across all major features to ensure the application functions correctly on mobile devices, including navigation, authentication, video playback, form submission, and interactive elements

quotes: can u recheck it again if things are working fineL

acceptanceCriteria: All navigation links and buttons respond to touch input
Internet Identity authentication completes successfully on mobile browsers
Movie catalog displays correctly and cards are tappable
Video playback controls work with touch input
Forms can be filled out and submitted on mobile devices
Dialogs and modals open, display correctly, and can be dismissed on mobile
Service worker loads correctly and does not prevent app initialization

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Preserve existing mobile optimization work in frontend/index.html viewport configuration
Maintain service worker functionality while ensuring it does not block app loading
nonGoals: Adding new features or functionality beyond fixing mobile compatibility
Redesigning the UI or changing the visual layout
Modifying backend logic or data models
